Health

Trending Health Topics Coronavirus 19covid Diabetes Fertility doctor

  • Participaction report card gives children a D-plus for physical activity

    The new Participaction report card gave children and youths a D-plus for overall physical activity and a D-plus for sedentary behaviours, according to a two-year stretch of research and data analysis through February 2020. 1

  • Ontario will not make it mandatory to wear masks or face coverings

    As more businesses prepare to reopen their doors on Friday, the Ontario government says it will not make it mandatory to wear masks or face coverings—although they remain recommended by health officials.

  • Cheap and widely available coronavirus drug proves to be life-saving, researchers say

    Researchers in England say they have the first evidence that a drug can improve COVID-19 survival: A cheap, widely available steroid called dexamethasone reduced deaths by up to one third in severely ill hospitalized patients.

  • Americans are the unhappiest they've been in 50 years, survey suggests

    Americans are more unhappy today than they've been in nearly 50 years, a new poll suggests.
